name: Monsterz Minigames
description:
Survive an avalanche of ridiculous minigames! Packed with quirky characters, Monsterz Minigames features frantic, fast-paced action and hilarious animation. Help the monsters discover secrets and alternate endings. Score bonus points, unlock achievements, and crush increasingly difficult levels as you work your way toward fun prizes. Can you lift the whale above your head? Can you avoid the giant foot in the sky? Download Monsterz Minigames now and find out!

• Fun animated characters
• Hilarious, impulsive gameplay
• Secrets and alternate endings
• Challenging achievements
• Awesome prizes
• Available in 14 languages
• Works offline
• No ads or in-app purchases
